author: Tyler Frandsen
comment: Parrot is a very respectful app, it has many features, most of which are turned off by default, it asks for permission only when you try to do something that requires it, and it never asked me for a permission it didn't obviously need. I am confused why bluetooth recording is limited to 8kHz, but given the experience I'm willing to assume that's google's fault

author: Fowana Terry
comment: Worth the paid version. I use it for lectures, and recording important phone calls. It's extremely simple to use. Would recommend

author: NEERAJ KOTWAL
comment: It's good at recording functions. But shows app data in over GBs after recording a couple of recordings of only few minutes in its lowest settings. Thus it blocks my storage space.

author: Madhu Krishna
comment: Crashes all the time on my new oneplus5t. Very bad app

author: marvin fulton
comment: I would like a refund it doesn't work !!!

reply.author: Searing Media Inc.
reply.content: Hello, please send us an e-mail at feedback@theparrotapp.com and we'll help you out and gladly give you a refund if we cannot help you resolve your issue.

author: OriginalName
comment: It simply does its job

author: Sérgio rg
comment: reliable and super ease to use
A great app for school

author: Luis Lucar
comment: Only installed a few hrs ago. Poor performance. App crashes all the time on Samsung Galaxy s7. Does not record all phone conversations. Does not work with Bluetooth devices either. Only records my voice with Bluetooth, not the other party. I tried different ways and settings. Uses a lot of system resources and slow down phone performance. Need to be reimbursed.

reply.author: Searing Media Inc.
reply.content:
Hi Luis,

Please send us an email at feedback@theparrotapp.com and we'll help you out.

Thanks!

author: Larry Fischer
comment: I really needed to have something recorded and the file said it was corrupted. Very disappointing

reply.author: Searing Media Inc.
reply.content:
Hi Larry,

Please send us an email at feedback@theparrotapp.com and we'll help you out.

Thanks!

author: Pete Tinsley
comment: Buggy, keeps crashing even when not running. (Latest version)

reply.author: Searing Media Inc.
reply.content:
Hi Pete,

Please send us an email at feedback@theparrotapp.com and we'll help you out.

Thanks!

author: mister jush
comment: amazing

author: Nezih Kanbur
comment: Simple clear interface, good quality, no ads, recording doesn't end by screen turn off. I loved it and recommend. Edit: I have a very small graphic glitch on Android 7.1 which doesn't prevent normal operation. A thin line exists on the left side of the record button. As the button transforms, it's like there are remnants of a vector button shape. I use the app with a modified rom though, on a phone that doesn't even support Android 4.4. That's may be about that.

reply.author: Searing Media Inc.
reply.content:
Hi Nezih,

Thanks for the bug report, we will look into it.

author: Dennis Rice
comment: Fantastic app; does what I need very well. Have to dock a star because I get relatively frequent notifications that parrot has stopped working, when I may not have used it in weeks. Not sure why it's running in the background, or why it keeps crashing.

author: Cris C.
comment: The interface is clean and intuitive. Doesn't bog you down with ads, I don't even think it has any. Picks up alot of hiss anytime I change the microphone though, even if I just put it back on default after, no idea why. Nexus 5x

author: 3swb
comment: A good recorder with a lot of options etc. I was able to get it to work fully after a bit of fiddling with the options- my phone's microphone is a bit rubbish to begin with but this does the best it can!

author: James Wood
comment: Great app, I really like that there are no adds...

author: Steve G
comment: A status bar notification saying "Recording to Done" keeps popping up after unlocking the device. Moto E, 4.4.4

reply.author: Searing Media Inc.
reply.content:
Hello,

This was a notification bug which we have now resolved (no background recordings were made). Please update and this will be resolved.

author: Christopher Lyon
comment: Do not advertise bluetooth recording capabilities if you cannot get it to work (Samsung s8). Embarrassing...
This is a fantastic recorder app. Excellent quality and user friendly. Thank you for fixing the bug

reply.author: Searing Media Inc.
reply.content:
Hello,

This was a notification bug which has now been resolved (no background recordings were made). Please update to resolve the issue.

author: Baboon Grinder
comment: Do not advertise bluetooth recording on phone calls when pro paid version doesn't work at all on a Samsung Note 8 or s8.

reply.author: Searing Media Inc.
reply.content:
Hi Baboon,

Bluetooth recording does work in the app, could you email us at feedback@theparrotapp.com so that we can help you out?

comment: Did not record Bluetooth mic

reply.author: Searing Media Inc.
reply.content:
Hello,

Could you email us at feedback@theparrotapp.com so that we can help you out?

Thanks

comment: One of my best apps.

author: Truckin On
comment: It work so well
title: Recording Proof

comment: It seems a good recording app but Tech Support is non-existent. None of my emails are being responded to & app devs wonder why they get one star. I'm uninstalling it & trying another.

reply.author: Searing Media Inc.
reply.content: Could you try to email us at feedback@theparrotapp.com so that we can help you out?

author: Eddie Ambrosano
comment: The app keeps crashing and I have a galaxy s8. And I paid for  pro.
Maha fuddu app

reply.author: Searing Media Inc.
reply.content:
Hello,

Could we help you with any particular issue? Please email us at feedback@theparrotapp.com

author: Nikitas Kartsonas
comment: Great app

author: Michela McGee
comment: Awesome audio quality, way better than any voice-recorder I've ever used. I use it to record lectures in one of my art history classes and I can hear every word recorded so clearly! Even when the speaker has moved to the other side of the room it still picks it up crystal clear. Would definitely recommend to others.

author: John Murray
comment: Voice recording works, but have lost the ability to record phone calls (voice from caller).

reply.author: Searing Media Inc.
reply.content:
Hi John,

You can access an array of settings for Phone Calls by opening the side menu (three lines in the top left), then tapping the "Phone Calls" row.

From the Phone Calls screen, you can adjust the "Boost Low Volume" and "Merge Streams" settings to help increase the volume of the other side of the call.

comment: This is a really cool app. So easy to install,  use and play back and with great sound quality

author: Rockie Lee
comment: Great recorder app

author: Ben Nathanson
comment: Simple and Powerful

author: JAKE BEEFCAKE
comment: Awesome
Good

I paid $20.00 for this app and I can't even save on my SD card properly. I also lost a recording today with critical information in it  and it didn't even record the time I wanted, it just stopped without warning. I really don't know how this app was able to score 4.3 in the app store. What a joke!

reply.author: Searing Media Inc.
reply.content:
Hello,

We would like you to help resolve this issue as soon as we can. Please email us at feedback@theparrotapp.com and we will help you out.

author: Adam Bones
comment: Crashes in the background non stop. Backup is broken. Emailed support, they lied. Files are trapped in /data. Never before have I hated a developer

reply.author: Searing Media Inc.
reply.content:
Hi Adam,

We would like to help you solve this issue. We have recently updated our Dropbox integration in an attempt to resolve your specific issue. Could you email us again at feedback@theparrotapp.com so we can help you resolve the issue?

Thanks

author: Peter Sage
comment: The Parrot is caged in my Samsung and shrieks happily.

author: Gavin P
comment: it's free for basic recording features. it's ad free. very good quality recording. nice easy to use interface

reply.author: Searing Media Inc.
reply.content:
Hello Gavin,

Android will automatically reclaim and background memory used whenever it is needed. We have background processes which are ready in order to allow our users to record using widgets, wearables and for our Pro users, phone calls and scheduled recordings.

author: Ray Bateman
comment: Like to record music that I create.Best Non Professional app I  found for recording
